ComicInfo.Summary:
The Untold History of the Creeper continues! What REALLY happened to the lost colony of Roanoke? As Devon dives deeper into the past, he puts himself in danger today!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Stuart Sayger | 1 | B | Cover B | Kewber Baal & Schimerys Baal | 2 | C | Cover C | Tom Mandrake & Sian Mandrake | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Stuart Sayger | 4 |
